body.value:
Scenario1 : The laptop is all quiet after pressing the power-on button. Scenario 2: You see LEDs on the laptop flash when you press the power button or hear the fan or hard drive kick over for a second and stop.
Steps to take Action 1. Remove the battery from the laptop. Make sure the AC power adapter is plugged in. Press the power-on button again. Action 2. Check if the voltage/current printed on the AC power adapter matches the voltage/current label on the laptop. You can normally find the label on the bottom case where the battery is located at.) Action 3. Wiggle the power jack to the laptop Action 4. Does the DC voltage measured at the connector of the AC adapter matches the voltage printed on the label of the AC adapter?
Can the laptop be powered on properly now? [Yes] [No]
